latex:
In the expression $ \frac{x + 1}{x - 1}$ each $ x$ is replaced by $ \frac{x + 1}{x - 1}$. The resulting expression, evaluated for $ x = \frac{1}{2}$, equals:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 3\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ -3\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 1\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ -1\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{none of these}$
